subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Amid a sea of blue and red jerseys Sunday at the Giants’ first game at New Meadowlands Stadium, there were several thousand empty seats, including 1,200 of the expensive club seats that went unsold.
snippet: Amid a sea of blue and red jerseys Sunday at the Giants’ first game at New Meadowlands Stadium, there were several thousand empty seats, including 1,200 of the expensive club seats that went unsold.
